abstract.para: Use the systemctl and journalctl commands to investigate the reasons for a failed system service.

topic.para: When &systemd; fails to start a service, a generic error message is displayed, for example:
topic.screen: &prompt.root;systemctl start docker Job for docker.service failed because the control process exited with error code. See "systemctl status docker.service" and "journalctl -xe" for details.
